column3: hom ntwa ewuo; osiandɛ wɔayɛ Taere afo ma ofi nnyi mu bio
column4: obi nnhɛn mu bio; wofi Kittim asaase do eyi akyerɛ hɔn."

column3: hom ntaa dzinn; hom Sidon eguadzifo a hom twa po no wɔama hom ahyɛ ma."

column2: "Hom faa esu akɛse do hom ndzinoa nye Sihor aba
column3: na Nael ho ndɔbaa; hom yɛɛ amanaman eguadzifo."

column2: "Hom ntwa nkɔ Tarsis; ao hom mpoanofo
"Ana hom enyigye kurow a ofi tsetse bɔbɔɔ adze no
column3: na n’anan dze no dɔɔ mu kɔr ekyirekyir kɛtsenae no nye yi?"
ahenkyɛwmafo kurow a n’eguadzifo yɛ mbapɔmba
column4: na n’abatafo yɛ asaase do enyimnyamfo no?"

column3: ɔabɔ ne tsirmpɔw dɛ obogu enyimnyam ahopɔw nyina ho fi
column4: na ɔdze asaase do enyimnyamfo nyina aba enyimguase mu."

column2: "Bu do fa w’asaase do dɛ esutsen Nael
column3: Ao Tarsis babaa; bambɔ biara nnyi hɔ bio."
ɔawosow nhenman: EWURADZE ahyɛ Keenan ho mbra

column4: ɔwo Zidon ba ɔbaabun a wɔahyɛ wo do: soɛr
column5: kotwa mu kɔ Kittim; na hɔ so mpo irinnya ahomgye."

column3: Kaldeafo asaase; ɔman yi wonnyi hɔ bio; Asirianyi no kyekyeree maa sar do mbowa: wosisii hɔn abantsentsen

column2: "Da bi bɛba dɛ werɛ befir Taere mfe eduosuon
column3: tse dɛ mbrɛ ɔhen kor ne nda tse: na mfe eduosuon n’ewiei no wɔbɛyɛ Taere tse dɛ dza ɔwɔ edwaman no no ndwom mu no."
edwaman a werɛ efir wo. Bɔ sanku dɛɛdɛw

column6: na ɔnye wiadze ahendzi horow a ɔwɔ asaase enyi nyina agor ndwamangor."

column2: "Na n’eguadze nye n’apaadze bɛyɛ krɔnkrɔndze ama EWURADZE: wɔnnkɛfa esie korakora
column3: eso worinntsia; na n’eguadze bɛyɛ hɔn a wɔtse EWURADZE enyim no dze
